page.title: 05Clubs and Activities.
page.content: Our area is quite a long way from the town so we have to have our own activities.Every Tuesday there is{ {Bingo}in our village hall. Also we have our own{Brownie Pack}which meet every Tuesday in our school.Near important occasions such as Christmas or Easter we have a{Whist Drive,} playing for a prize of a turkey or an Easter egg. Fortnightly a{ {Silver-thread club}meet in the village hall for a meal which they cook themselves,and a chat.Every Thursday a{Youth Club}meets.They play billiards,snooker,table -tennis,darts and they have refreshments.On Wednesday there is a{Ladies Club}where ladies go and chat in each others houses,it is held once a month. Just outside of our "D" block is a{Bowls {Club and a Tennis Club. }
